description: This table summarizes data for AP Claims, with each claim that is the node of a split in an adjustment sequence given one row.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPLIT_CNT
columns.description: Contains the number of additional claims pointing to a split claim in an adjustment sequence.

columns.name: CLM_SPLIT_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: Contains all of the claims that are at the node of a split in an adjustment sequence
